content: boyfriend hat by andrea riddle a simple ribbed hat you can whip up in a night or two when you need to make a quick gift for your daughter s boyfriend right before the holidays materials one skein of malabrigo noventa or 90 yards of chunky yarn us 10 5 and us 11 needles or size to obtain gauge gauge 12 stitches to 4 when slightly stretched this yarn is very flexible so gauge is not critical pattern using smaller needle cast on 60 stitches using the german twisted cast on or stretchy cast on of your choice place marker and join to work in the round work a knit 3 purl 2 rib as follows *k3 p2 * repeat from * to * to end work for 8 rounds or about 2 change to larger needle and continue working 3 x 2 rib pattern until hat measures 7 5 relaxed or 7 when slightly stretched widthwise you may change the depth of the hat to had more of a cuff or to reduce the slouch anywhere from 6 5 to 7 75 will work more than 7 75 when slightly stretched wide and you may run out of yarn decrease the hat as follows row 1 *k3 p2 k2tog k1 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 2 *k3 p2 k2 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 3 *k3 p1 k2tog k1 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 4 *k3 p1 k2 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 5 *k3 k2tog k1 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 6 *k5 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 7 *k2 k2tog k1 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times we are now decreasing every round row 8 *k1 k2tog k1 p2* repeat from * to * 6 times row 9 *k2tog k1 p2 * repeat from * to * until the last 5 stitches k2tog k1 p1 slip next stitch knitwise remove marker slip next stitch knitwise k1 psso replace marker after cdd row 10 *p1 k2tog k1* repeat from * to * until the last 2 stitches k2tog row 11 * k2tog k1 * repeat from * to * until the last 4 stitches k2tog k2tog row 12 k1 * k2tog* repeat from * to * to the last st you will have 6 stitches on your needle cut yarn pull yarn through these stitches twice then sew in your ends wrap it up and put it under the tree or mail it off to your loved ones loved one abbreviations k - knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together knitwise psso pass slip stitches over cdd slip the next two stitches together knitwise knit the next stitch pass the slipped stitches over the knitted stitch 3 x 2 rib knit 3 stitches purl 2 stitches
